administering_body: Drug court judges; Court clerks; County treasury; Arkansas Department of Community Correction
governs: Permits drug court judges to order offenders to pay court costs, treatment costs, drug testing costs, program user fees, supervision fees, and monitoring fees
Requires judges to establish payment schedules and directs court costs and program user fees to be remitted to the court clerk
Specifies that court costs are credited to the county administration of justice fund and local program user fees are credited to a local drug court program fund
Requires fees under §§ 12-27-125(b)(17)(B) or 16-93-104(a)(1) to be paid to the Department of Community Correction
